companyName: ETRACS Monthly Pay 2xLeveraged Wells Fargo MLP Ex-Energy ETN
description:
The investment seeks a return linked to the monthly compounded 2x leveraged performance of Wells Fargo® Master Limited Partnership Ex-Energy Index, less investor fees.
 The index is intended to measure the performance of all non-energy master limited partnerships (“MLPs”) listed on the New York Stock Exchange (“NYSE”), NYSE MKT or NASDAQ that satisfy market capitalization and other eligibility requirements.
